dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 26.5 × 34.2 cm (10 7/16 × 13 7/16 in.)
inscribed:
Inscribed in plate, lower left to right: BRVEGEL. M.D. LXV. / P. Perret fe .79. / Cum Privilegio.

Inscribed in plate below image, center: QVI SINE PECCATO EST VESTRVM, PRIMVS IN ILLAM LAPIDEM MITTAT. Ioan. 8. / Antverpia apud Petrum de Iode.
